Key Match Events: Ismaël Koné scored in the 22nd minute
Jonathan David scored in the 80th minute
Rodrigo Bentancur scored in the 8th minute
Luis Suárez scored in the 90th +2 minutes
The match ended in a 2-2 draw after regular time and extra time
Post-Match Reflections: Uruguay beat Canada on penalties to finish 3rd in the Copa América
Uruguay manager blasted Copa América organizers after the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at Bank of America Stadium in Charlotte, North Carolina
